## 5.2 Consciousness Takes Time


## Somatosensory Potentials: Libet 

> "Studies suggest that consciousness of an event is only associated with electric field (or electric potential) patterns in neural tissue that persist for at least 300 to 500 ms"

- Backward Masking
   - An experimental procedure in which target images are flash very briefly and conscious awareness is blocked by subsequent images.
   - Suppose two stimuli are presented to a subject. The second stimulus is presented less than 500 ms after the first. The second stimulus may "mask" conscious awareness of the first stimulus.

   - A metaphorical tree with lights corresponding to active brain regions.

Component  | Size | Composition  
-------- | ------ | ------- 
Large Bulb | cm | Cortical region 
Mid-size Bulb  | mm | Macrocolumn 
Tiny light | 0.3 mm | CCC 
Very tiny light | 100 $\mu$m | Minicolumns 
[Cortical Layer] | 100 $\mu$m  | Vertical in mini-column
